00118 typedef struct vocMsg {
00119     int         type;                   /* message type                 */
00120 
00121     ObjectID    objId;                  /* for CALL messages            */
00122     char        method[SZ_METHOD];
00123     int         nparams;                
00124 
00125     int         status;                 /* for RESULT messages          */
00126     int         restype;                
00127     int         nitems;         
00128 
00129     char        class[SZ_CLASS];        /* for MESSAGE messages         */
00130     char        msgstr[SZ_MSGSTR];
00131 
00132     char        message[SZ_MSGBUF];     /* fully formed message         */
00133 } vocMsg_t;

00137 typedef struct vocRes {
00138     int         status;                 /* result status                */
00139     int         type;                   /* type of result value         */
00140     int         nitems;                 /* no. of returned items        */      
00141     char        value[MAX_VALUES][SZ_MSGSTR];   /* value strings        */
00142 
00143     void        *buf;                   /* bulk data buffer             */
00144     int         buflen;                 /* length of buffer             */
00145 } vocRes_t;

00148 typedef struct VOClient {
00149     char   *server_host;                /* socket to DALServer          */

00151     int     io_chan;
00152 
00153     int     msg_port;                   /* asynch message socket        */
00154     int     msg_chan;
00155 
00156     int     onetrip;                    /* private invocation flag      */
00157     int     debug;                      /* debug flag                   */
00158     int     quiet;                      /* suppress output?             */
00159     int     use_cache;                  /* use cached results?          */
00160 
00161 } VOClient, *VOClientPtr;
